div.p: This Privacy Policy explains Trademeda.com's dedication to protecting your privacy. By using this website, you agree to the terms described here.
Trademeda, the company behind this website, values your privacy. We use your personal information solely to manage your account and deliver the services you request, such as B2B trade connections.

Occasionally, we may reach out with promotions and updates via mail, email, phone, text messages, and automated calls. As a business advertising platform, we may also share your details with potential business partners. Non-registered users cannot access your contact information but can send inquiries through our system.

I. Business Information: This includes contact details, company profile, trade leads, buy leads, catalogs, and inquiries collected during registration, newsletter subscriptions, email communications, feedback, or surveys.
II. Payment Information: Data related to payments made via credit card, cheque, or bank transfer, such as name, address, email, phone number, credit card number, CVV, and bank details.
III. Information like visitor IP addresses, browser software, operating systems, and pages viewed.
These are collectively referred to as "Information Gathered."
i. This information is made public to maximize your business reach and may be shared with authorized agents and verification agencies.
ii. Payment Information: We do not disclose this information unless required by law. Credit card information is processed directly by payment gateways and is not stored on our site.
iii. Statistical Information: Collected to enhance our services and manage site performance, this data is shared in aggregate form without personal details.
We may disclose "Information Gathered" if legally required or if withholding it would harm our or our users' interests.
i. Modify your business information by logging into your account..
ii. Request deletion of your information via the "terminate membership" option in your profile or by contacting us directly.
iii. We typically process removal requests within 48-72 business hours.
Your public profile remains online indefinitely unless you request its removal.
Our site may include links to third-party websites. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies and terms of use, as we are not responsible for their content or services.
We use cookies to recognize you on our website, a common practice for login-based sites.
We implement measures to protect your data, but by using this site, you waive any claims against us for the loss, alteration, or misuse of information.
This Privacy Policy may change over time. Review it regularly for updates, as continued use of the site implies acceptance of any changes.
Any disputes regarding this Privacy Policy will be governed by the laws of India, and fall under the jurisdiction of Civil court of Patna, Bihar,India.
